summary: This is an email exchange between defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim and Mark S. Cohen regarding the drafting and filing of a joint letter in the case U.S. v. Maxwell. The email includes a draft attachment and discusses filing plans.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email, circulating a draft letter regarding a defense request about the MDC warden in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Appears as the recipient and correspondent, inquiring about the draft joint letter and identified as the attorney from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim representing the defense in U.S. v. Maxwell.

connections.description: Corresponding about drafting and filing a joint letter related to a defense request in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Drafting of joint defense letter
events.description: Mark S. Cohen circulates a draft joint letter regarding a defense request about the MDC warden, with plans to file it by 7:30 PM unless otherwise instructed.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange dated December 1, 2020, regarding the case U.S. v. Maxwell.
The correspondence involves defense attorneys Mark S. Cohen and Bobbi C. Sternheim collaborating on a joint letter.
The subject matter relates to a defense request concerning the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) warden.
The email indicates the legal team was working remotely due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
